name: Polymorph (maudev)
description:
Finding the right portal to go back home isn’t as easy as it may seem, and the way can be treacherous for anyone who is lost. Thankfully, in Space, someone can be more than one.

Try to overcome the different puzzles by transforming yourself and discovering all that you can do. Sometimes, it can be useful to be a polymorph creature.

This game was made in less than 48 hours, in the second game jam of Jam Nation Season 2 . 

  • Theme : Diversity / Non-human
  • Constraints : Game made with Unity, Only one input

A game by : 

  • Myriam Boisvenue St-Jean (game design, art (characters and UI))
  • Maxime Jacquet (sound design and music)
  • Félix Leblanc (game design, level design, programming)
  • Maude Roussin (game design, level design, programming)
  • Cristelle Sinnett (game design, art (static elements))
